channel.title: Need help with sword look on server
channel.description:
guys this is one of my custom swords i made:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/awesomesword.jpg[/img]
but the problem is it only shows up on the downloadable client looking like that...
when people are on my webclient of the server it looks like this to them:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/gaysword.jpg[/img]
how do i make it so it looks like this on both the client and webclient?:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/awesomesword.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need help with sword look on server
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

[quote=“flamehair9, post:2, topic:349719”]Hey Can u help me real quick?? I found a bunch of custom items on the server i downloaded and i just want to know how to put the items into my client. Also Could u help me with putting my server online aswell?? thank you.

Flamehair9[/quote]

Just look at the client hacking section It will help you a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with sword look on server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

it’s because the custom items are client sided and the reason it does that is because you’re pretty much just making a normal item look like a custom one

Read full topic
